Your army's leaders attempt to bolster the soldiers' morale and fight back the effects of fear and panic. Attempt a @Check[type:morale|defense:morale|roller:self|options:action:rally] check against a target enemy army of your choice.

Critical Success If your army is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.Item.Routed], it loses the routed condition. Reduce your army's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.kingmaker-features.Item.Shaken] condition by 2.

Success Reduce your army's shaken condition by 1.
